attributes.action: The real problems with this government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Isn’t the problem whilst we can see some positive changes occurring in the country these are marred by the constant false promises to resolve issues that affect our day-to-day life.  We have seen some good opportunities to voice our opinions/concerns however these appear to have fallen on deaf ears and have in the main have had little or no affect. I am certainly irritated at what appears to be  a patronising and condescending approach. Governments are elected to run the country to operate and develop our society and if we consider the issues such as health, education, law and order, cost of living along with our right to object to changes being reduced and in some cases removed, this brings in to question  ‘all we can do is wait until the next general election, or is it?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
